name: chatbubbles
author: ɛᴀɢɛʀ
description:
ChatBubbles for IOS.

• ChatBubbles is a Tweak to get ChatHeads on IOS. From Messenger to iMessage/Sms - this is still in early stages but will be updated eventually, with more features, bug fixes & increased stability. so far it is only avalible to IOS 13-14.2, i recommend downloading CallBubbles as its the same but works with calls.

• ChatBubbles has minor issues which i will list here with fix.

• once installed if you recieve a call and dont answer you will respring to safemode. or if you close the bubble while one comes through.

•

• FIX •

• remove the messenger tweak if youd like to use without error

• once i have found a fix i will update, you can try use tweaks similar to lifegaurd to try respring/force safemode using volume buttons (INSTALL SUBSTRATE SAFEMODE!!).

2.6.7: ChatBubbles now auto installs CallBubbles for better UI Experience.
